title: CAMERA SETTINGS
body:
Hi fellow saltplayers
ATM i'm playing with locked camera and i really want to switch to unlocked, but i don't how to do so. I have heard, that there is a setting, where you can hold down a button and then you can move the camera from there. Then you don't need to touch the sides of your screen. I haven't been able to find out, where i can change that or what default hotkey it is set to
Thank you guys in advance

replies.body:
You're on the right track! The setting you're looking for is called "Drag Scroll" which can be found in the settings on the client. 

- Click on the gear icon for settings
- Choose Game Settings
- Just under the camera move speed you'll see "Mouse button drag scroll"

After turning this on, you'll be able to move the map by middle clicking and dragging. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
